column4: (althought personally I am a huge vim fan for over the last 10 years ...) it's the best way of editing a textfile for me, because how you control it makes so much sense to me, but I would not recommend it for someone used to TextMate
this is an a D state, which means uninterruptable sleep, you can't kill it, not even with -9
sorry it seems i have a lot of outdated info
